channel.title: Having trouble with the web client?
channel.description:
If you are having trouble with the moparscape v 3.1 webclient with errors such as:
1.Red cross in the corner of your screen 2.Black screen 3.Website doesn't load.
Then do the following:
Go to https://sdlc2a.sun.com/ECom/EComActionServlet;jsessionid=F6D3A02DBE76408B079FE793837F6752 to download the latest version of java which is java jdk 9 without netbeats. Once you have downloaded this.... install it to your computer. Now go back to www.moparisthebest.com and check if the web client is working now. If it still isn't your best bet is to download the moparscape client.
Hope it helped.

item.title: Having trouble with the web client?
